creator: Viddsee
descriptionHtml:
Watch the best short films hand-picked just for you, including award-winning drama films, animations, documentaries, and web series.

Browse thru different genres, topics, language and countries like comedy, romance, drama, thriller, sci-fi, fantasy, action, animation, documentary, inspirational, family, sexuality, Chinese, Filipino, Indonesian and many more

Download the films offline, for smooth viewing on the move! Save on data charges as you get entertained too!

No ads. No hidden fees. Download and use the Viddsee app for free.

How does Viddsee work?
+ Viddsee adds new short films and stories every day. Browse the latest and trending short films.
+ Receive specially curated weekly films just for you
+ Join into conversations with our active story-loving community
+ Queue your favourite short films to watch them later on desktop or mobile
+ Download your favourite short films for offline viewing
+ All short films contain English subtitles

All our permissions are used to improve your app usage and experience, let us explain more:
- “find accounts on the device” - this is for a safer, faster Facebook login (if you choose to login to like or queue a film across web and app)
- “access media files” - this is required for you to save films for offline playback
- “run at startup” & “view wi-fi connections” - this is required for automatic downloading of offline films when you are on wi-fi networks, this will help you save data when watching films
- “set an alarm” - this is for notifications to remind you of new films every thursday (you can turn this off in the app settings)
- “prevent phone from sleeping” - this is required when watching the film so that your film doesn’t snooze while you are halfway thru the film

Viddsee was covered by The Hollywood Reporter, Variety, Techcrunch, Yahoo, The Next Web and many more...

If you like Viddsee, do drop us a review here in the Play Store.
